suppress.notes: file name: spring-web* //A potential threat - spring won't fix this as some internal implementation depends on unsafe deserialisation https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/issues/24434#issuecomment-579669626, however, there are no outward facing HTTP Invoker endpoints in this repo.
file name: snakeyaml* // this is temporary until snakeyaml releases a fix.
file name: bouncycastle* // this is temporary until bouncycastle releases a fix.
file name: fasterxml* // this is temporary until fasterxml releases a fix.
file name: joda-time* // this is temporary until joda-time releases a fix.
file name: logback* // this is temporary until logback releases a fix.
